creator: maartenth@notthefly.com
text:
In the documentation of the subtags of the <condition> task, the example for 
<resourcecount> is this:

<resourcecount refid="myresourcecollection" when="greater" length="0" />

However, the "length" attribute does not exist. The "count" attribute should be 
used instead.

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text: Jan fixed this at rev 581151.  Thanks!
